reviews.review_msg: He is a really Caring and wants you to actually enjoy and learn through your capstone project.

I heard a lot of people complain about him, but honestly he was one the nicest instructors I've ever had. Pays a lot of attention to details but at the end of the day makes sure that you've understood the material properly. If you are willing to put in the work I recommend him 100%
He is a great prof in class, great teaching skills, great knowledge,... but at the end, if he doesnt like you, you wont enjoy the class, nor the markings at all...
This is one of the best instructors you could ever have. Classes are super interesting, very clear, with real like examples. Test correlate with the material covered in class! Just great

This guy is amazing! Our whole class actually stood up and clapped for him on the last class.. his grading is very fair and is willing to help students anytime. Just make sure you understand his assignments well.. each and every question! and you will get at least get a B+.. which is average when he curves..
